column4: good. Still time." He walked over to a group of pillows in the far corner of the room
column5: and I realized that they had been strewn around a little raised platform of stone.

column1:
2339|11.39|There's a whisper down the line at 11.39
When the Night Mail's ready to depart
column2: Saying "Skimble where is Skimble has he gone to hunt the thimble? We must find him or the train can't start."
